extendedInfo.description: Play multiplayer online with people all over the world! Battle it out in REAL TIME ACTION!Shoot, dogde, attack, and flank the enemy planes!Invite your friends to the WAR!Recommended requirements: 600Mhz and dedicated GPU (Droid) or 1Ghz (Incredible, N1)Account and Device Id permissions used for Google's In-app Purchase APITags: online, multiplayer, battle, arena, air, flight, combat, attack, strategy, war, game, planes, RTS, 1942, DOTA, sky, flying, dogfighting, dogfight, fun, shooter, MOBA, starcraft custom maps, pvp, warcraft map, pearl harbor, world war 1, WWI, WW1, WWII, WW2

reviews.title: More guns?
reviews.comment: Figured the big bomber or P51 would have had more guns on them. Fun game though. Waiting to battle online still. Need a wifi hotspot now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but lose planes and progress
reviews.comment: Fun game, kinda a pissoff bc i busted my hump to unlock the mustang, then for no reason it lost it for me... Did it again this morning,  so it will lose another star...plus multiplayer is NOT working...guess ill wait till next update b4 i play anymore...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Much better than drawing lines to land planes on a carrier. Actually TO & land, dog fight and upgrade your planes. Add more planes and I\'ll give tje last star. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Scott McKenzie

reviews.title: Exotic and fun
reviews.comment: The software is user-friendly and its simulation is exciting
reviews.author: Shayan Shahedi

reviews.title: No saved cash???
reviews.comment: Flew all day and then the next day thought ide get a new plane.. I even shared on facebook for 500g... but no I didn\'t know you cheap smucks delete your gold! Waste of time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: So much fun alone or online. Wish there were more planes you could buy and sooner. Takes so much money to upgrade to a new one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This game is so fun and I like how you can change to other ways to fly your plane.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fixes needed
reviews.comment: I love the game. Slowly worked my way from easy to difficulty 35, then skipped to hard. Recommend \'Touch control setting. Multiplayer freezes at \342\200\235waiting for server to start game.\342\200\235 Planes should be easier to buy and be more different between them (like bomber shoots 3 weak guns).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good and enjoyable
reviews.comment: The game is a well designed time-waster, definitely better than most free ones out there. Worth playing. Graphics are nice, music is very repetitive but suits it. The difficulty levels could be better balanced though, plus more modes to play it. BTW, survival is ridiculous, enemies should come in waves or something... It needs to be improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boomshakalaka!
reviews.comment: GREAT GAME! Takes forever and a day to try and play multiplayer. Thats pretty much the only down fall to this game is that its not a popular game yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superslayer
reviews.comment: Awesome time killer. good graphics
